scripts.watch:host: concurrently "npm run build:watch --prefix host-app" "npm run preview --prefix host-app"
scripts.watch:user: concurrently "npm run build:watch --prefix user-app" "npm run preview --prefix user-app"
scripts.watch:offer: concurrently "npm run build:watch --prefix offer-app" "npm run preview --prefix offer-app"
scripts.watch:all: concurrently -c auto -n HOST,USER,OFFER "npm run watch:host" "npm run watch:user" "npm run watch:offer"
